name: clarity-for-facebook
description: A cross-platform browser extension to clean up your Facebook feed by filtering unwanted content
author: swe-tranquang

scripts.build:all: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:edge
scripts.package:chrome: cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=chrome npm run build:chrome && node scripts/package.js
scripts.package:firefox: cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=firefox npm run build:firefox && node scripts/package.js
scripts.package:edge: cross-env TARGET_BROWSER=edge npm run build:edge && node scripts/package.js
scripts.package:all: npm run build:all && npm run package
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm run package
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build:chrome && node scripts/test-load.js chrome
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build:firefox && node scripts/test-load.js firefox
scripts.test:edge: npm run build:edge && node scripts/test-load.js edge
